solution_line_template: First multiply the number of spots on the left side by 3: {left_spots} spots * {multiplier} = <<{left_spots}*{multiplier}={right_spots_times}>>{right_spots_times} spots
Then add 7 to find the number of spots on the right side: {right_spots_times} spots + {right_spots_add} spots = <<{right_spots_times}+{right_spots_add}={right_spots}>>{right_spots} spots
Then add the number of spots on each side to find the total number of spots: {right_spots} spots + {left_spots} spots = <<{right_spots}+{left_spots}={total_spots}>>{total_spots} spots
